code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import BottomNavbar from'../components/Navbar';import Header from'../components/Header';import'../styles/AccueilO.css';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import LeafletMap from'../components/Map';import"../styles/detailchantier.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getTypeLabel=typeNum=>{switch(typeNum){case 0:return"Climatisation";case 1:return"Pompe à chaleur";case 2:return"Chaudière";default:return"Unknown Type";}};const ChantierDetails=()=>{const[chantier,setChantier]=useState(null);const{chantierId}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5257/api/chantier/".concat(chantierId)).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setChantier(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching chantier details:',error));},[chantierId]);if(!chantier){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No data available"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{titre:"D\xE9tails Chantier"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detailchantier",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:getTypeLabel(chantier.type)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Client : ",chantier.client]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description : ",chantier.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date de d\xE9but : ",chantier.dateDebut]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Adresse : ",chantier.adresse]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeafletMap,{address:chantier.adresse})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BottomNavbar,{})]});};export default ChantierDetails;
